title: The Commandos
creator_credit: Cine Service, Australia. Royal Air Force. Films Advisory Bureau and Geoffrey Thompson
brief_description: Shows the tough training which makes CMF commandos: unarmed defence, cross-country fitness tests, cliff-climbing, parachute-jumping, canoeing and swimming. Includes an exercise in which commandos attach an “enemy strong-point” by sea and air.
creator_credit_for_label: Cine Service, Australia. Royal Air Force. Films Advisory Bureau and Geoffrey Thompson
